description:
'''New beat''' is a Belgian [[electronic dance music]] genre that fuses elements of [[New wave music|new wave]], [[hi-NRG]], [[electronic body music|EBM]] and [[hip hop music|hip hop]] (e.g. [[scratching]]). It flourished in Western Europe during the late-1980s.

New beat spawned a subgenre called "hard beat" (a blend of EBM, new beat and acid house) and became a key influence on the evolution of European [[electronic dance music]] styles such as [[Belgian techno]], [[hardcore techno]] and [[gabber]].
